listing.street_address: Old Dalkeith Road, Danderhall, Dalkeith, EH22 1FD

opening_hours.note: Minor variations exist across sources; recommend verification with venue

listing.summary: David Lloyd Club Edinburgh Shawfair is a premium health and fitness facility opened in August 2023 in Danderhall, south-east Edinburgh. The 100+ station gym, dual heated pools (20m indoor, 25m outdoor), 23 tennis courts, luxury spa with Himalayan salt sauna and ice cave, and 100+ weekly classes across 4 studios serve the Midlothian and East Lothian areas. Comprehensive family facilities including crèche, kids' club, and holiday clubs make it a full-service leisure destination.

studio_types: BLAZE Studio (HIIT with heart rate monitoring)
equipment_highlights: Body Hub (BioAge testing, hydration monitoring, metabolic tracking)
additional_facilities: David Lloyd Clubs App for booking
special_programs: Female health sessions (pre/post-natal, women's health seminars)
nearby_amenities: Sheriffhall Park and Ride (380 feet southwest)

train_stations: Edinburgh Park Central Light Rail Station (8-minute walk)

other_attributes.tennis_leagues: Participates in VMH Solicitors East tennis leagues (Division 9a winners)
other_attributes.estimated_pricing_range: £69-£129+ per month (2025 estimates, varies by membership type and tier)
other_attributes.pricing_note: Exact prices not published online; requires direct club contact
other_attributes.member_feedback_2024: Early 2024 reports of overcrowding during peak times, parking challenges, long spa queues, booking system issues, and app reliability concerns
other_attributes.capacity_discussion: Some members reported 3,000 member cap mentioned, though disputed

entity.tennis_summary: 23 courts total: 12 indoor courts, 7 outdoor courts, and 4 courts within an aerodome (covered tennis dome). Expert tennis and racquet coaching available.
entity.padel_summary: 3 outdoor padel courts available for play and coaching.
entity.swimming_summary: 20m heated indoor pool and 25m heated outdoor pool with aqua aerobics, family swim times, adult swim sessions, and swimming lessons for adults and children.
entity.gym_summary: 100+ station gym featuring cardio machines, free weights, cable machines, Hammer Strength equipment, EGYM Smart Strength machines, Wattbikes, and a dedicated stretching and recovery zone with Body Hub for BioAge testing and metabolic tracking.
entity.classes_summary: 100+ classes weekly across 4 bespoke studios including signature David Lloyd classes (BLAZE HIIT, IGN1TE martial arts-inspired HIIT, SPIRIT yoga/Pilates/meditation, Cyclone group cycling) plus standard offerings in yoga, Pilates, strength training, aqua aerobics, and more.
entity.spa_summary: Spa Retreat featuring Himalayan Salt Sauna (indoor and outdoor), Crystal Steam Room with bespoke aromatherapy, heated spa pool, plunge pool, ice cave, scented spa showers, and heated beds for relaxation.
entity.hospitality_summary: Large restaurant-quality clubroom with freshly cooked meals, café, business lounge/workspace, family dining area, and outdoor patio with outdoor dining.
entity.family_summary: Dedicated family zone with crèche, kids' club with daily activities, swimming lessons, tennis coaching, Lego Squad, Rebels BLAZE (ages 8+), Rebels Battlebox (ages 8+), arts and crafts, indoor playframe, outdoor playground, and holiday clubs.
entity.parking_and_transport_summary: 250 free parking spaces for members. Located just off Edinburgh City Bypass (A720) with easy access. Shawfair Railway Station approximately 1 mile north (9-minute walk) on Borders Railway line. Bus routes 33, 48, 51 serve the area with nearest stop 4 minutes walk away.
entity.reviews_summary: 4.6-star rating with 368 reviews. Members praise excellent facilities, friendly staff, luxurious spa, and clean modern environment. Early 2024 criticisms included overcrowding during peak times, parking difficulties, long spa queues, and app reliability issues.
